document.full_text: an iowa man allegedly shot four people to death in idaho early on friday, including his two young sons, before turning the gun on himself, authorities said, describing the incident as a murder-suicide.
document.title: five die in apparent murder-suicide in idaho: police
lines_and_colors: an iowa man allegedly shot four people to death in idaho early on friday, including his two young sons, before turning the gun on himself, authorities said, describing the incident as a murder-suicide.
